text: <a href="../1-Chronicles-14-1/" title="1 Chronicles 14:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Now Hiram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and timber of cedars, with masons and carpenters, to build him an house.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-2/" title="1 Chronicles 14:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And David perceived that the LORD had confirmed him king over Israel, for his kingdom was lifted up on high, because of his people Israel.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-3/" title="1 Chronicles 14:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And David took more wives at Jerusalem: and David begat more sons and daughters.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-4/" title="1 Chronicles 14:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 Now these *are* the names of *his* children which he had in Jerusalem; Shammua, and Shobab, Nathan, and Solomon,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-5/" title="1 Chronicles 14:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And Ibhar, and Elishua, and Elpalet,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-6/" title="1 Chronicles 14:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-7/" title="1 Chronicles 14:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 And Elishama, and Beeliada, and Eliphalet.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-8/" title="1 Chronicles 14:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And when the Philistines heard that David was anointed king over all Israel, all the Philistines went up to seek David. And David heard *of it*, and went out against them.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-9/" title="1 Chronicles 14:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 And the Philistines came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-10/" title="1 Chronicles 14:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And David enquired of God, saying, Shall I go up against the Philistines? and wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the LORD said unto him, Go up; for I will deliver them into thine hand.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-11/" title="1 Chronicles 14:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 So they came up to Baalperazim; and David smote them there. Then David said, God hath broken in upon mine enemies by mine hand like the breaking forth of waters: therefore they called the name of that place Baalperazim.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-12/" title="1 Chronicles 14:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And when they had left their gods there, David gave a commandment, and they were burned with fire.
<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-13/" title="1 Chronicles 14:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-14/" title="1 Chronicles 14:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Therefore David enquired again of God; and God said unto him, Go not up after them; turn away from them, and come upon them over against the mulberry trees.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-15/" title="1 Chronicles 14:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And it shall be, when thou shalt hear a sound of going in the tops of the mulberry trees, *that* then thou shalt go out to battle: for God is gone forth before thee to smite the host of the Philistines.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-16/" title="1 Chronicles 14:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 David therefore did as God commanded him: and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gazer.

<a href="../1-Chronicles-14-17/" title="1 Chronicles 14:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And the fame of David went out into all lands; and the LORD brought the fear of him upon all nations.
